Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the the fabric is relatively coarse, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393429) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393429)
